descriptionHtml:
[b]Version 1.69 released! To get the armor to look like what\'s in the screenshots, please use the TKF ENB by TKF: [color=cyan]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20350[/color][/b]


Fiend armor is a standalone endgame retexture of various pieces of armor and clothing. But what\'s special about this is that each piece has green glowing patterns and things on the armor. Most of these glows are just daedric script.
Each piece also has its own recipe for crafting and tempering. All at their respective crafting stations.

In order to access the recipes, you need to have one of the nightingale abilities (shadow, subterfuge, or the other one that nobody cares about) and you have to be over level 35.

Each piece of armor is actually a retexture of the following armors:
Fiend Armor: Nightingale Armor
Fiend Mask: Dragon Priest Mask
Fiend Boots: Blades Boots from Remodeled Armor by MAK [url]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13004[/url]
Fiend Gauntlets: Thalmor Gloves

The mod also comes with a dwarven sword retexture that also glows, and displays a bit of profanity on the glow of the blade.

Oh by the way, MAK made the mesh for the female boots in his Remodeled Armor mod, so thank him if you like the boots.
author: Bzhuan
